mapper.insert: INSERT INTO students(full_name, name_pronunciation, nickname, email, area, birth_date, gender, remark, is_deleted) VALUES (#{fullName}, #{namePronunciation}, #{nickname}, #{email}, #{area}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{remark}, false)
INSERT INTO students_courses(student_id, course_id, start_date, end_date) VALUES (#{studentId}, #{courseId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE students_courses SET course_id = #{courseId} WHERE attending_id = #{attendingId}
UPDATE course_status SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
